casebody.data:
IN RE: C.B.C. 115A19-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 21, 2019 J. Thomas Diepenbrock, Attorney at Law, Asheville, for Clippard, Wesley V. Michael S. Harrell, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for Corbett, Barry A., et al.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 21st of May 2019 by Respondent-Father:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 21st of May 2019."

Respondent-Father shall have up to and including the 22nd day of May 2019 to file and serve his/ her brief with this Court.
